attrs.script:
#script

base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?_return_fields%2B=name,ipv4addrs&_return_as_object=1"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

if "@@{VLAN}@@" == "54":
    network="10.68.99.0/24"
elif "@@{VLAN}@@" == "55":
    network="10.48.104.0/22"
elif "@@{VLAN}@@" == "56":
    network="10.68.99.0/24"
else:
    print "Error: unknown vlan"
    exit(1)

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r


reservation_payload = {}
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = []
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = [{"ipv4addr":"func:nextavailableip:"+network}]
payload = json.dumps(reservation_payload)
print "Payload: " + payload
for host in vmName:
    reservation_payload['name'] = host + ".@@{domain}@@"
    r = process_request(base_url, 'POST', user, password, headers, reservation_payload)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    ip = result['result']['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    print ip

#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]
i = 1


def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() + ".@@{domain}@@"
    print base_url
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result
    print result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    print "NODE"+str(i)+"_IP=",result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    i += 1

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files: 
- content: |
    DEVICE="eth0"
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO=static
    IPADDR=@@{PreDeployment.NODE1_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{GATEWAY}@@
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
- content: |
    search workshop.local
    nameserver @@{DNS_SERVER}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
runcmd:
- service network restart

users:
  - name: @@{USERNAME}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{ROOT_PWD}@@
    @@{USERNAME}@@:@@{USERNAME_PWD}@@
  expire: False
 
runcmd:
 - [ hostnamectl, set-hostname, "@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@" ]
 - [ ifdown, eth0 ]
 - [ ifup, eth0 ]

attrs.script:
#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
delete_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() +".@@{domain}@@"
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result[0]['_ref']
    print delete_base_url + result[0]['_ref']
    #################
    base_url = delete_base_url + result[0]['_ref']
    r = process_request(base_url, 'DELETE', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result

attrs.script:
#script
print "Enabling NGT..."

vm_uuid = "@@{platform.metadata.uuid}@@"
vm_uuid_url = "https://@@{PC_IP}@@:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/" + vm_uuid
cluster_uuid_url = "https://@@{PC_IP}@@:9440/api/nutanix/v3/clusters/"

pc_user = "@@{pc.username}@@"
pc_password = "@@{pc.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

print vm_uuid_url
r = process_request(vm_uuid_url, 'GET', pc_user, pc_password, headers)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result
print result["status"]["cluster_reference"]["uuid"]
cluster_uuid = result["status"]["cluster_reference"]["uuid"]
###########
cluster_uuid_url = cluster_uuid_url + cluster_uuid
r = process_request(cluster_uuid_url, 'GET', pc_user, pc_password, headers)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result
print result["status"]["resources"]["network"]["external_ip"]
cluster_ip = result["status"]["resources"]["network"]["external_ip"]
###########
config_url = "https://"+ cluster_ip + ":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/vms/" + cluster_uuid + "::" + vm_uuid + "/guest_tools/"
print config_url
payload = {
  "vmUuid": cluster_uuid + "::" + vm_uuid,
  "enabled": "true",
  "applications": {
    "file_level_restore": "false",
    "vss_snapshot": "true"
  }
}
r = process_request(config_url, 'POST', pc_user, pc_password,headers, payload)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result

#!/bin/bash

echo "Configuring time zone"
sudo timedatectl set-timezone "America/Vancouver"
echo "installing packages for AD integration"
sudo yum install sssd samba-common-tools adcli realmd ntp ntp-doc krb5* -y
echo "configuring NTP"
sudo cp -p /etc/ntp.conf /etc/ntp.conf.orig
sudo echo "
restrict default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery
restrict -6 default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery
restrict 127.0.0.1
restrict -6 ::1
server @@{AD_IP}@@
driftfile /var/lib/ntp/drift
keys /etc/ntp/keys" | tee /etc/ntp.conf
sudo systemctl start ntpd
echo "Discovering domain"
sudo /usr/sbin/realm discover workshop.local
sudo su - -c "echo "@@{windows_ad.secret}@@" | /usr/sbin/realm join -v -U "@@{windows_ad.username}@@" --computer-ou="ou=sqlclusters,dc=workshop,dc=local" workshop.local"

attrs.script:
$appName= "@@{calm_application_name}@@"
$hostCount = @@{HOST_COUNT}@@
$userInput = $appName.Substring(0,3).ToUpper()
echo $appName
$found = Get-DnsServerResourceRecord -ZoneName "workshop.local" | Where-Object {$_.hostname -match '^P-HQ-VM-'+$userInput+'.*'} | Sort-Object -Property hostname -Descending | Select-Object -First 1
if ($found) { 

echo "VM related to this app where found, generating incremental names"

$incr = $found.HostName.Split("-")
$appIndex = [int]$incr[4]
for ($i = 1; $i -le $hostCount; $i++) {
$appIndex++
$vmname = $incr[0] + "-"+ $incr[1] + "-"+ $incr[2] + "-"+ $incr[3] + "-"+ $appIndex.ToString("00")
$node = "NODE$i" +"_NAME"
echo "$node=$vmname"

}
} 

else {
echo "No VM related to this app where found, generating new names"
for ($i = 1; $i -le $hostCount; $i++) {
$vmname = "P-HQ-VM-$userInput-0$i"
echo "NODE1_NAME=$vmname"
}

}

# get formated user name
$Requester = Get-ADUser -Filter "UserPrincipalName -eq '@@{USERNAME}@@'"
$user = $Requester.GivenName
echo "REQUESTER=$user"

""" #!/bin/bash From="Calm@tinkerbell.local" # need to change this To="sgassim@nutanix.com" # Subject="Your application lol is ready!" Body="

Hello @@{AD.REQUESTER}@@,

You have requested application @@{calm_application_name}@@ from the Marketplace, we have successfully deployed your application and you can start using it using the following informations:
Service type: CentOS 7
Machine ip address: @@{PreDeployment.NODE1_IP}@@
Machine name: @@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@
Login: @@{USERNAME}@@
Password: @@{USERNAME_PWD}@@
For security reasons, please do not share your password with anyone.
Regards,

The Cloud Team

" echo " import email.message import smtplib server = smtplib.SMTP("\"10.68.98.177\"", 25) msg = email.message.Message() msg['Subject'] = "\"${Subject}\"" msg['From'] = "\"${From}\"" msg['To'] = "\"${To}\"" html_content="\"${Body}\"" msg.add_header('Content-Type', 'text/html') msg.set_payload(html_content) server.sendmail(msg['From'], [msg['To']], msg.as_string())" | tee ~/send_notification echo "Sending user notification" python ~/send_notification """

attrs.script:
#script

base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?_return_fields%2B=name,ipv4addrs&_return_as_object=1"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

if "@@{VLAN}@@" == "54":
    network="10.68.99.0/24"
elif "@@{VLAN}@@" == "55":
    network="10.48.104.0/22"
elif "@@{VLAN}@@" == "56":
    network="10.68.99.0/24"
else:
    print "Error: unknown vlan"
    exit(1)

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r


reservation_payload = {}
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = []
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = [{"ipv4addr":"func:nextavailableip:"+network}]
payload = json.dumps(reservation_payload)
print "Payload: " + payload
for host in vmName:
    reservation_payload['name'] = host + ".@@{domain}@@"
    r = process_request(base_url, 'POST', user, password, headers, reservation_payload)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    ip = result['result']['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    print ip

#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]
i = 1


def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() + ".@@{domain}@@"
    print base_url
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result
    print result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    print "NODE"+str(i)+"_IP=",result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    i += 1

 - [ ifup, eth0 ]

#!/bin/bash

echo "Configuring time zone"
sudo timedatectl set-timezone "America/Vancouver"
echo "installing packages for AD integration"
sudo yum install sssd samba-common-tools adcli realmd ntp ntp-doc krb5* -y
echo "configuring NTP"
sudo cp -p /etc/ntp.conf /etc/ntp.conf.orig
sudo echo "
restrict default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery
restrict -6 default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery
restrict 127.0.0.1
restrict -6 ::1
server @@{AD_IP}@@
driftfile /var/lib/ntp/drift
keys /etc/ntp/keys" | tee /etc/ntp.conf
sudo systemctl start ntpd
echo "Discovering domain"
sudo /usr/sbin/realm discover workshop.local
sudo su - -c "echo "@@{windows_ad.secret}@@" | /usr/sbin/realm join -v -U "@@{windows_ad.username}@@" --computer-ou="ou=sqlclusters,dc=workshop,dc=local" workshop.local"

$appName= "@@{calm_application_name}@@"
$hostCount = @@{HOST_COUNT}@@
$userInput = $appName.Substring(0,3).ToUpper()
echo $appName
$found = Get-DnsServerResourceRecord -ZoneName "workshop.local" | Where-Object {$_.hostname -match '^P-HQ-VM-'+$userInput+'.*'} | Sort-Object -Property hostname -Descending | Select-Object -First 1
if ($found) { 

echo "VM related to this app where found, generating incremental names"

$incr = $found.HostName.Split("-")
$appIndex = [int]$incr[4]
for ($i = 1; $i -le $hostCount; $i++) {
$appIndex++
$vmname = $incr[0] + "-"+ $incr[1] + "-"+ $incr[2] + "-"+ $incr[3] + "-"+ $appIndex.ToString("00")
$node = "NODE$i" +"_NAME"
echo "$node=$vmname"

}
} 

else {
echo "No VM related to this app where found, generating new names"
for ($i = 1; $i -le $hostCount; $i++) {
$vmname = "P-HQ-VM-$userInput-0$i"
echo "NODE1_NAME=$vmname"
}

}

# get formated user name
$Requester = Get-ADUser -Filter "UserPrincipalName -eq '@@{USERNAME}@@'"
$user = $Requester.GivenName
echo "REQUESTER=$user"
